EmailTemplate.name: TS-2016-03-14-Pure Accelerate.EMAIL-Post Event
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name}}'s Pure//Accelerate 30-Day VMTurbo Download
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, It was our pleasure to meet and speak with you earlier this week at Pure//Accelerate. Our booth staff was astounded by the innovation happening at the and organizations with which we spoke. As promised, here is a follow-up email inviting you to learn more about how VMTurbo can Guarantee Quality-of-Service Adherence for your organization.
At right, you'll find several data sheets and a lab report from Principled Technologies demonstrating how VMTurbo increases application response time by over 30% without any baselining or configuration. We encourage you to try VMTurbo FREE for 30 Days, by downloading now <[[http://vmturbo.com/downloads/operations-manager-30-day-trial?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=pureaccelerate&utm_content=031816]]>. The papers and reports are compelling, but the performance will speak for itself.
- The VMTurbo Team Download Now <[[http://vmturbo.com/downloads/operations-manager-30-day-trial?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=pureaccelerate&utm_content=031816]]>
- Principled Technologies Study: VMTurbo Boosts Performance <[[http://vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/VMTurbo_large_environment_0116.pdf]]> - VMTurbo Datasheet <[[http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/VMTurbo-Operations-Manager-Data-Sheet.pdf]]> - Application Control Datasheet <[[http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Application-Control-Module-Data-Sheet.pdf]]> - Pure Storage Control Datasheet <[[http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Pure-Storage-Control-Module-Data-Sheet.pdf]]>
<[[http://vmturbo.com/downloads/operations-manager-30-day-trial?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=pureaccelerate&utm_content=031816]]>
